text: @SenMcSallyAZ @POTUS @VP Our country’s response to the coronavirus should be unifying but once again Trump is dividing, not leading. If he could just step up and face reality that the market is reacting to the coronavirus, he would look like a leader. But then we’re talking about Trump.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
